characters: The scene features a white van driving ahead of the self-driving vehicle. A red sedan is also visible in the distance.
summary: The self-driving vehicle is traveling on a straight road during daylight hours. A white van is driving ahead in the same lane. A red sedan is visible further ahead in the distance. The road has buildings and trees on either side. There are no immediate dangerous behaviors observed.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed and following the white van ahead. The vehicle is likely maintaining its speed due to the clear road conditions and the absence of immediate obstacles. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the van.
